original: Atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhīti?
analyzed: atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāraḥ manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhi iti

original: nanu natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
analyzed: nanu natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogaḥ pe paṇidhi iti

original: Hañci natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogaḥ pe paṇidhi no ca vata re vattabbe

original: Phasso sārammaṇo, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
analyzed: phassaḥ sa ārammaṇaḥ atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogaḥ pe paṇidhi iti

original: Rūpaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
analyzed: rūpam sa ārammaṇa atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogaḥ pe paṇidhi iti

original: saññā cetanā cittaṁ saddhā vīriyaṁ sati samādhi paññā rāgo doso moho māno diṭṭhi vicikicchā thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ …pe…
analyzed: saññā cetanā cittam saddhā vīriyam sati samādhi paññā rāgaḥ dosaḥ mohaḥ mānaḥ diṭṭhi vicikicchā thinam uddhaccam ahirikam pe

original: anottappaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
analyzed: anottappam sa ārammaṇa atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogaḥ pe paṇidhi iti

original: Rūpaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
analyzed: rūpam sa ārammaṇa atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogaḥ pe paṇidhi iti

original: Rūpaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
analyzed: rūpam sa ārammaṇa natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogaḥ pe paṇidhi iti

original: Phasso sārammaṇo, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
analyzed: phassaḥ sa ārammaṇaḥ na atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogaḥ pe paṇidhi iti

original: Rūpaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
analyzed: rūpam sa ārammaṇa natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogaḥ pe paṇidhi iti

original: anottappaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
analyzed: anottappam sa ārammaṇa natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogaḥ pe paṇidhi iti

original: Hañci rūpaṁ sappaccayaṁ, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci rūpam sappaccaya tena vata re vattabbe
rūpam sa ārammaṇa anti kathā niṭṭhitā
